title: Add Job Requirements section to Trustline Financial Services site

requirements.text: Add a new “Job Requirements” section to the Trustline Financial Services homepage with professional, website-ready copy describing the requirements for a Credit Card Sales role.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section is visible on the home page with a clear H2 heading such as “Job Requirements” or “Credit Card Sales — Job Requirements”.

The section content is written in professional English and includes the key requirements discussed: minimum education (high school; degree preferred), communication skills, basic computer/CRM skills, confidence with customers, target-driven mindset, customer handling, and positive attitude.
The section uses an HTML section anchor id (e.g., id="job-requirements") so it can be linked/scrolled to.
Styling is consistent with the existing site theme (cards/typography/spacing) and responsive across mobile/desktop.

requirements.text: Update site navigation to include an anchor link to the new Job Requirements section from the top navbar and footer quick links.
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar includes a “Job Requirements” (or “Careers”) item that scrolls smoothly to the new section when on the Home page.
Footer “Quick Links” includes a matching link that navigates to #job-requirements.
Navigation behavior matches existing section scrolling behavior (works from Admin page by returning to Home then scrolling).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not add a job application submission flow (no resume upload, no apply form, no backend storage for job applications).
Do not introduce new authentication or change the existing Admin submissions behavior.
Do not add or modify generated image assets for this change.
